translations.If you are currently trying log in from: If you are currently trying log in from another device or browser please approve the request. If you are not trying to log in at the moment, you should use the cancel option to abort the login attempt.
translations.Authenticate using a device that is alre: Authenticate using a device that is already logged in to your account
translations.Allows using any of your logged in devic: Allows using any of your logged in devices as second factor
translations.Please accept the request on one of your: Please accept the request on one of your logged in devices.
translations.You will be redirected automatically onc: You will be redirected automatically once this login has been accepted.
translations.Use two-factor authentication via Nextcl: Use two-factor authentication via Nextcloud notifications
